p: Before you learn how to program, you should become familiar with Reeborg's world and its surroundings.

This text appears in the Content panel; you can resize it horizontally by "grabbing" its right edge with your mouse. You can also make it disappear, or reappear, by clicking on the Content button at the very top.
The panel to the right of this one is the Editor panel, where you will write the programs that Reeborg will execute. It will do so in the third panel, known as the World panel.
Try resizing the various panels and making them disappear and reappear by pressing the various buttons at the top, just to get a feel of how you can rearrange the environment.
Once you're satisfied with your exploration, click on the Next button, either at the top or bottom of this Content panel, to go to the next lesson, where you will have Reeborg take its first steps.
